title: Escape the Darkness of Low Elo: Warding and You

replies.body: Buy some vision then climb a division
I logged in just to up vote this.
this post is legendary
So did I

when u sign in just to upvote the post

You cant escape low elo Riot!! not when {{champion:5}} has a {{item:3085}} !!!. And when you get teams like this EVERY game http://imgur.com/lyAAfHI
Why is your first item fully upgraded boots? Don't blame your team mates if you yourself are not a Jedi yet

Correct answer is DON'T PLAY {{champion:27}} SUPPORT

The correct answer is actually DON'T PLAY TOP because what ever champ you play top lane you end up feeding with ( 1 12 {{champion:2}} ) while I have played {{champion:27}} Support for 4 years now, do well, and actually know how to play.

>while I have played {{champion:27}}  Support for 4 years now, do well, and actually know how to play.

This is why you are bronze 4, because you assume your actually playing well, when evidence shows the opposite.

I was bronze 4 last season finished in gold 5 this season i was silver 4 an finished plat 4. You're trash admit it. You're like every other bronze player who says their team is bad while you contribute nothing to the team except "boots".
*SLAMS DESK* THANK YOU

Guess people really need to buy more {{champion:254}} {{champion:14}} 

Anyone get it? no? no? k.

this is great!
I thought Master+ never buy wards, they can smell where the enemy jungler is :P{{champion:17}}
{{champion:19}}
nicee

While I do agree with this post, in the next season vision is going to be even more important.  Stealth wards are being removed and thereby giving fewer options for warding; from what I've seen.  I think next season we'll have even more Trinkets and fewer Sweepers, unless of course there are other options within the game that I haven't read about yet.

At first I found that to be the case, except you'll get 2 wards on yellow at the start of the match and an auto upgrade
basically removing proof of whos good and who aint rip

Yeah but your not taking into account of Sightstones {{item:2049}}. Its a known fact that buying a sightstone then placing the free wards it possesses, they do not count as RAW Data as purchased wards.
However, only Supports and Lee Sin (who arguably is only buying it for mobility rather than actual vision) buy Sightstone and Supports already have a consistent warding pattern.
Too bad half decent Junglers will get one as well,I run {{item:2049}} on {{champion:131}} jungle because free wards and extra health is ALWAYS a good thing
You say that, but in high enough elo, junglers that can get a sightstone too, it helps so much with vision control.
dude every one thinks cause lol your bronze u suk high elo means fuk all give me 4 good players and lets make a team and show these tools how to play
But, to be fair, this thread is targetted at Bronze-Low Gold players
"Better than that fourth long sword" U wot m7
{{item:2044}}  see what you did there.
Just no.{{item:2043}} {{item:3070}}
{{champion:64}} Bitch Please
{{item:3364}} Now you don't see anything.

these stats are just pathetic, although not surprising..... ever see the support pink their tri bush??? TRY IT!!! Guarantee it will save both you and your ADC at least every other game. do it top as well, same reason. mid put it by in the bushes top or bottom of the lane between 1st and second tower. sure the ward may sit there untouched the entire game, but the next it will SAVE YOU.
i don't even play ranked (so by default am bronze 5) but i ward every game regardless of role. i use all 3 trinkets, usually upgrade, and based on roles, will switch trinkets during the game based on need. 
support, sweeper for laneing, into placing pinks late game. 
ADC, yellow, into upgraded blue late (no more face checking as a priority target)
and yet i see whats shown in this data, every game my complaining about "jungler camping", or camps being raided, or mid roaming without a MIA call, but no ward except MINE.
I'm actually really disappointed about the blue trinket disappearing next season, it has saved my life often, and saved multiple dragons and barrons.
WARD GUYS IT'S NOT ROCKET SCIENCE
"Don't need vision when im the best" -{{champion:92}} plaers

pardon?
{{champion:122}} is the best
Lol rip im retarded
Gotta know where INSIDE the brush to put the wards as well, for optimum vision. Not just stick it in there.

It's honestly not hard to get out of elo hell. I've started since June s4 and I got b2 that season. Next season I was b5 the entire season untill the last 3 weeks. I started ranking and got silver 5 within 2 weeks. Stop making excuses about your team and get your shit together. If you're team is bad sometimes, your enemy team is going to be bad sometimes too.

http://oce.op.gg/summoner/userName=AllGudNamesRGone Have never once stuck with a normal trinket (unless losing too heavily to care about vision) 
Do I deserve Masters? ^~^
How the shit are you s4 you lose more than me.

HAHA, if you look closely again, you'll see I carry most of the games I lose anyway.
Also, silver isn't really something to be proud of, yet another things that proves to me you're not that great (no offense)

p.s you also feed in almost every game you played...

riot is removing wards anyway
Can't really do that if rito is removing wards{{item:2044}}
Yeah, this seems odd. I hope they are backtracking on removing {{item:2044}}

I'm like the opposite of most players, I'm a good team player and use wards/sweeper much more effectively than almost everyone at my rank (gold V), but I can't climb any higher cause I'm mechanically terrible at the game. My reaction timing is slow, and I fail at dodging most skillshots.

I'm sorry, but i buy alot of wards, like easily 18+ per game, and i never play support, im mainly a jg, top main, i can fill in for mid lane and still do good and can adc, but i buy alot of wards yet im still in low silver O.o,to me wards can't make your team get any better, even if an area is warded people still make the dumbest mistakes and go into the fog of war, i can't say i haven't but there are alot of unskilled players who do that. i dont want to sound like and ass though, sorry D:{{champion:92}} {{champion:64}} {{champion:254}} {{champion:107}}
18+ PER GAME...lol that is waaay to many wards...1350 gold worth of wards...
